their child’s risk of having a low verbal IQ and poor reading accuracy and comprehension by the time they 
were eight years of age [46]. It appears that the more iodine levels drop during pregnancy, the lower the 
child’s performance in terms of IQ and reading ability.
14.2.5 Antioxidants
